alert.note: Alert for Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 5:25PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Troup County through 600 PM EST... At 525 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Piedmont Heights, or 8 miles west of LaGrange, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Hogansville, Piedmont Heights, Cannonville, Harrisonville, Hillcrest, Wares Crossroads, Louise, State Line Park, Abbottsford and Long Cane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
